title: Andar Ki Baat
overview: In a neighborhood, there are two women, one who dries her undergarments openly on the rooftop, and the other who discreetly hides them while drying. Some boys believe that the lady who openly dries her undergarments is easily approachable, but they are severely punished. While, the lady who dries them discreetly ends up having an affair with the boy.
